ComicInfo.Title: Necessary Evil
ComicInfo.Summary:
NECESSARY EVIL CONTINUES! It's The Power Rangers vs Lord Zedd, as seen through the-literal-lens of Bulk & Skull. But can these two film the latest episode of Ranger Station and truly escape unscathed?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Main Cover | Ivan Shavrin | 1 | B | Preorder Variant Cover | Miguel Mercado (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 2 | Var | 1:20 Album Variant Cover | Amelia Vidal | 3 | Var | Social Variant Cover | Johanna the Mad (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 4 | *Notes:* The 1:20 Album Variant Cover is a homage of the album cover for Smashing Pumpkins' Siamese Dream.
